title: Interactive Learning Design for Architectural Education: A Socioconstructivist Online Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory architectural theory and design processes, proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: Designing Interactive Learning Environments Combining Mathematical Thinking and Architectural Design Processes for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve architectural design problems through collaborative dialogue with peers and instructors in a virtual design studio.
Learners can operate a feedback system utilizing text, images, and videos in a non-real-time online environment (LMS).
Learners can creatively propose spatial organization plans applying mathematical modeling through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
